title: Did not receive special icon for gifting Rakan or playing as Xayah with a Rakan
body: Most of my friends have already gotten their icons while i have not, is there an issue? Or is Riot slowly rolling  them out?

replies.body: There will be a lot of eligible players, so it's going to take some time to roll them out to everyone.  Per the[ promotion page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions), give us about 2 weeks after tomorrow.  Hang tight until then!

Hi Porocles,

Do TT games count for this promotion? The promotion starts off with the quote:

> Earn a special summoner icon by bringing Xayah and Rakan together _**on the Rift**_

But then also 

> Any completed normal, ranked, or bot game mode will count (custom games excluded)

Is the "on the Rift" just fluff verbage, or should the second quote also say "on Summoner's Rift"?

~~As I understand it, the messaging meant any matchmaking mode for Summoner's Rift.  Twisted Treeline, ARAM, or Poro King would not have unlocked eligibility.~~  Hope that helps clear things up, and that the icon comes your way!

**Update**:  I was wrong!  Any matchmade mode minus customs should grant the icon, including Twisted Treeline!
Yay! So [crushing those poor, poor TT bots](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2482708407/92046?tab=overview) was eleven minutes well spent.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FuktdfYI,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-25T21:00:10.822+0000)
>
> **Update**:  I was wrong!  Any matchmade mode minus customs should grant the icon, including Twisted Treeline!

Thanks! I was dreading having to get a qualifying SR game in by the deadline. Cheers!
